result.eng: He stayed away from the drink, that was the main thing.
result.ga: D'fhan sé ón ól b'in é an príomhrud
result.orig: D'fhan sé ón ól b'in é an príomhrud
result.html: D'fhan sé ón ól b'in é an príomhrudHe stayed away from the drink, that was the main thing.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟan sé ón ól b'in é an príoṁrudHe stayed away from the drink, that was the main thing.
